text: The Pemigewasset Valley Railroad was a railroad connecting Plymouth to North Woodstock, New Hampshire, United States. Funded by the Boston, Concord and Montreal Railroad, it was only independent for one month after construction before being permanently "leased" by the BC&M.;http://www.hoborr.com/history.html ==References== Category:Transportation in Grafton County, New Hampshire Category:Defunct New Hampshire railroads Category:Predecessors of the Boston and Maine Corporation
title: Pemigewasset Valley Railroad
